about_the_game:
Hayden's Odyssey : Break Through the Dimensions and Face the Unknown

Play as Hayden, a brilliant scientist drawn into a mysterious interdimensional portal. Plunged into unpredictable chaos, you'll have to traverse strange and hostile dimensions, each filled with ever-more formidable dangers, puzzles and enemies. Can you survive this scientific odyssey and find your way home?

Main features:

🌀 A thrilling roguelike: Discover procedurally generated levels offering unique challenges every time you play.

⚗️ An ingenious hero: Use Hayden's skills to take on hordes of enemies and solve complex situations.

🌌 Each level features a distinct aesthetic and atmosphere, ranging from a futuristic laboratory to lush natural environments to totally surreal dimensions.

⚔️ An evolving arsenal: Collect a multitude of items to strengthen Hayden and face increasingly powerful enemies.

🎨 Meticulous art direction: Immerse yourself in a variety of settings, combining modern, dark and fantastical textures to enhance immersion.

🎵 Captivating soundtrack: Let yourself be carried away by dynamic music tailored to each dimension and situation.

A challenge at every portal

With its demanding yet rewarding gameplay, Hayden's Odyssey will put your reflexes and strategic sense to the test.
Fans of roguelikes, exploration and science fiction will find here an adventure that lives up to their expectations.
Get ready to travel from portal to portal in a universe where every choice can be decisive.

name: Hayden's Odyssey

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 1060
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Hayden's Odyssey is a roguelike dungeon crawler where you explore procedurally generated levels, battle a variety of challenging enemies, and collect powerful upgrades. Each run brings new obstacles, ensuring that every journey through the portals is a fresh and intense experience.
